item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold, silver, copper, gems, trade goods. Sad though it is, it's hard to get what you need in life without money.

item.name: Food
item.description: We need to eat food to survive. Sadly, not all of it is appetizing or up to the standards of modern society, but sometimes you have to take what you can get.

item.name: Food
item.description: We need to eat food to survive. Sadly, not all of it is appetizing or up to the standards of modern society, but sometimes you have to take what you can get.

item.name: Food
item.description: We need to eat food to survive. Sadly, not all of it is appetizing or up to the standards of modern society, but sometimes you have to take what you can get.

item.name: Pants
item.description: They say that no matter how different we are from each other, we all put on pants the same way: one leg at a time. They don't account for people with tails, but the sentiment is nice.

item.name: Pants
item.description: They say that no matter how different we are from each other, we all put on pants the same way: one leg at a time. They don't account for people with tails, but the sentiment is nice.

item.name: Shirt
item.description: A good shirt keeps you warm in the cold, or breathes well in the heat and humidity. Some people, though, mostly wear them because society mandates it. That depends on the society though. Goblins usually don't care, for example.

item.name: Shirt
item.description: A good shirt keeps you warm in the cold, or breathes well in the heat and humidity. Some people, though, mostly wear them because society mandates it. That depends on the society though. Goblins usually don't care, for example.

item.name: Robes
item.description: Robes are the favored garment of most advanced spellcasters. Maintaining decency while granting free movement for arcane rituals has proven very valuable, although they are not the only option. They're also good for when you get out of the bath.

item.name: Rock
item.description: Rocks make wonderful companions! Unlike a dog or cat, pet stones never die, never get mad when you step on them, are often lovely to look at... Of course they're also good for lobbing at people's heads.

item.name: Rock
item.description: Rocks make wonderful companions! Unlike a dog or cat, pet stones never die, never get mad when you step on them, are often lovely to look at... Of course they're also good for lobbing at people's heads.

item.name: Stick
item.description: A long, often twisted or branched piece of wood, fallen or forcibly removed from a tree. May contain bark, twigs, and leaves. May also contain rot and bugs. You could hit someone with it, should you find yourself without a better weapon.

item.name: Stick
item.description: A long, often twisted or branched piece of wood, fallen or forcibly removed from a tree. May contain bark, twigs, and leaves. May also contain rot and bugs. You could hit someone with it, should you find yourself without a better weapon.

item.name: Mug
item.description: Civilized society tends to eat off plates, drink from cups, stab food with forks and knives, etc. Adventurers rarely have use for these things. They take up room in packs and add weight, so they eat with their hands, the old-fashioned way.

item.name: Plate
item.description: Civilized society tends to eat off plates, drink from cups, stab food with forks and knives, etc. Adventurers rarely have use for these things. They take up room in packs and add weight, so they eat with their hands, the old-fashioned way.

item.name: Bottle
item.description: A bottle is a good way to store liquids of various sorts. Easy to hold, easy to pour. Be careful with the unlabeled ones.

item.name: Bottle
item.description: A bottle is a good way to store liquids of various sorts. Easy to hold, easy to pour. Be careful with the unlabeled ones.

item.name: Candle
item.description: Some parts of the lands you'll explore are very dark. Darkness makes it difficult to see where you walk, objects in your path, and who or what you are stabbing with your sword. Candles will do the job, but not well. They're more for lighting homes than caves.

item.name: Lamp
item.description: Some parts of the lands you'll explore are very dark. Darkness makes it difficult to see where you walk, objects in your path, and who or what you are stabbing with your sword. A good lantern is great for this. Miners and spelunkers rely on them. But they're bulky and heavy.

item.name: Garbage
item.description: Um... This is useless. It may also be dirty and germy. Maybe shards of broken glass, rotten, moldy food and worse... Why did you pick it up?

item.name: Garbage
item.description: Um... This is useless. It may also be dirty and germy. Maybe shards of broken glass, rotten, moldy food and worse... Why did you pick it up?

item.name: Garbage
item.description: Um... This is useless. It may also be dirty and germy. Maybe shards of broken glass, rotten, moldy food and worse... Why did you pick it up?

item.name: Garbage
item.description: Um... This is useless. It may also be dirty and germy. Maybe shards of broken glass, rotten, moldy food and worse... Why did you pick it up?

item.name: Bones
item.description: Sadly, not everyone who goes on an adventure survives to tell the tale. This unfortunate soul, whether by a life of hardship or the fangs of a beast, has met its end and perhaps, with luck, has gone to a better place. And now you're disturbing its remains. How thoughtful of you.

item.name: Skull
item.description: Sadly, not everyone who goes on an adventure survives to tell the tale. This unfortunate soul, whether by a life of hardship or the fangs of a beast, has met its end and perhaps, with luck, has gone to a better place. And now you're disturbing its remains. How thoughtful of you.

item.name: Torches
item.description: Some parts of the lands you'll explore are very dark. Darkness makes it difficult to see where you walk, objects in your path, and who or what you are stabbing with your sword. Torches are lightweight, easy to pack, and easy to hold.

item.name: Torches
item.description: Some parts of the lands you'll explore are very dark. Darkness makes it difficult to see where you walk, objects in your path, and who or what you are stabbing with your sword. Torches are lightweight, easy to pack, and easy to hold.

item.name: Book
item.description: Books are one of the most valuable innovations society has developed. Whether they contain historical information, valuable instruction on casting spells or performing a trade, or even just pleasant works of fiction, books have enabled us to share what we know with others, present and future!

item.name: Book
item.description: Books are one of the most valuable innovations society has developed. Whether they contain historical information, valuable instruction on casting spells or performing a trade, or even just pleasant works of fiction, books have enabled us to share what we know with others, present and future!

item.name: Book
item.description: Books are one of the most valuable innovations society has developed. Whether they contain historical information, valuable instruction on casting spells or performing a trade, or even just pleasant works of fiction, books have enabled us to share what we know with others, present and future!

item.name: Robes
item.description: This is a thin poncho of sheer fabric, translucent but surprisingly strong. The Vahnatai, a peculiar race which lives far below the ground, make these unusual garments from hammered fungus. Though designed for the Vahnatai's slight frames, these garments serve the stouter races quite well too.

item.name: Knife
item.description: This knife can be used to slice vegetables for a lovely stir fry. However, it's mostly designed for stabbing people. Please wash it before slicing your vegetables.

item.name: Short Sword
item.description: A short sword is designed as a good sidearm, lightweight and quick to draw and swing in close combat. In a pinch they can be used as a primary weapon.

item.name: Club
item.description: Next to rocks, clubs are the simplest weapon in an adventurer's arsenal. Instructions for preparation and use: 1. Find something long and heavy. 2. Pick it up. 3. Whack someone with it. Pretty easy, although not always too effective.

item.name: Mace
item.description: An upgrade to the club, a mace is not just a heavy stick, but is actually a very sturdy stick with a big, heavy head at the end, coming in any number of shapes. Much more effective. You're still unlikely to impress anyone with it.

item.name: Axe
item.description: Axes, originally designed for cutting trees, have been redeveloped for cleaving skulls and beheading the condemned as well.

item.name: Spear
item.description: A spear is a long, straight pole with a pointy thing on the end. It's good for impaling your foes. Some spears are balanced for throwing: These are called javelins. This is not a javelin you are examining. It is just a spear.

item.name: Knife
item.description: This knife can be used to slice vegetables for a lovely stir fry. However, it's mostly designed for stabbing people. Please wash it before slicing your vegetables.

item.name: Short Sword
item.description: A short sword is designed as a good sidearm, lightweight and quick to draw and swing in close combat. In a pinch they can be used as a primary weapon.

item.name: Club
item.description: Next to rocks, clubs are the simplest weapon in an adventurer's arsenal. Instructions for preparation and use: 1. Find something long and heavy. 2. Pick it up. 3. Whack someone with it. Pretty easy, although not always too effective.

item.name: Mace
item.description: An upgrade to the club, a mace is not just a heavy stick, but is actually a very sturdy stick with a big, heavy head at the end, coming in any number of shapes. Much more effective. You're still unlikely to impress anyone with it.

item.name: Axe
item.description: Axes, originally designed for cutting trees, have been redeveloped for cleaving skulls and beheading the condemned as well.

item.name: Spear
item.description: A spear is a long, straight pole with a pointy thing on the end. It's good for impaling your foes. Some spears are balanced for throwing: These are called javelins. This is not a javelin you are examining. It is just a spear.

item.name: Hammer
item.description: This is a large hammer. This is not for driving nails, unless they are very large nails that are trying to kill you.

item.name: Rapier
item.description: A rapier is a long, thin sword, good for quick, agile swordplay. They call it swordplay. It's not really playing. For you, this is a game. You're playing a game. Your poor little pixel adventurer is in constant danger, at your command. Please play responsibly.

item.name: Broadsword
item.description: Broadswords are broad swords. More specifically, they're big, heavy swords, with a lot of momentum. Most people can't wield them one-handed, although if one were very strong it could work.

item.name: Flail
item.description: A flail is one or more spiky balls of metal, suspended from chains at the end of a stick. They are operated by being swung around utilizing centipetal force, and then slammed into someone's face.

item.name: Bardiche
item.description: A bardiche is a very long polearm with a large blade on one end. Unlike spears, it is meant for cleaving rather than stabbing. It is very difficult to use and must be held in both hands. It's good to use from a distance.

item.name: Halberd
item.description: A halberd is a long polearm with a spike and a blade on one end. It's good for stabbing and chopping, although due to its length it is difficult to use. It must be held in both hands.

item.name: Greatsword
item.description: This is a really, really, really big sword. It's very unwieldy but if you manage to hit someone in the leg with one, they will probably not have that leg anymore.

item.name: Great Mace
item.description: The great mace. In case you want to splatter your foes instead of just killing them. The king of clubs, and we're not talking cards.

item.name: Great Mace
item.description: The great mace. In case you want to splatter your foes instead of just killing them. The king of clubs, and we're not talking cards. It seems someone has enchanted this one. It may be even more effective than usual.

item.name: Slith Spear
item.description: This is a long, straight pole with a multi-tined blade affixed to the end. The Slithzerikai use these unusual spears in combat. These should not be confused with tridents, which are multi-tined harpoons designed for fishing. A slith spear is not for fishing.

item.name: Slith Spear
item.description: This is a long, straight pole with a multi-tined blade affixed to the end. The Slithzerikai use these unusual spears in combat. These should not be confused with tridents, which are multi-tined harpoons designed for fishing. A slith spear is not for fishing.

item.name: Wave Blade
item.description: This is an exceptionally well-crafted sword, the blade of which is forged into a distinctive wave pattern. The Vahnatai, a peculiar race that lives below the ground, are proud of these unusual swords hard to use, but really painful.

item.name: Wave Blade
item.description: This is an exceptionally well-crafted sword, the blade of which is forged into a distinctive wave pattern. The Vahnatai, a peculiar race that lives below the ground, are proud of these unusual swords hard to use, but really painful.

item.name: Wave Blade
item.description: This is an exceptionally well-crafted sword, the blade of which is forged into a distinctive wave pattern. The Vahnatai, a peculiar race that lives below the ground, are proud of these unusual swords hard to use, but really painful.

item.name: Wave Blade
item.description: This is an exceptionally well-crafted sword, the blade of which is forged into a distinctive wave pattern. The Vahnatai, a peculiar race that lives below the ground, are proud of these unusual swords hard to use, but really painful. It seems that someone has enchanted this one. It may be more effective than usual.

item.name: Razordisks
item.description: These are flat discs of metal, the edges honed into a ring of small, razor-sharp teeth. Their aerodynamic shape makes them deadly in combat, but a novice user must take care not to cut themselves when throwing them. The Vahnatai, a race which lives far, far below the ground, are quite fond of these unusual weapons.

item.name: Razordisks
item.description: These are flat discs of metal, the edges honed into a ring of small, razor-sharp teeth. Their aerodynamic shape makes them deadly in combat, but a novice user must take care not to cut themselves when throwing them. The Vahnatai, a race which lives far, far below the ground, are quite fond of these unusual weapons.

item.name: Darts
item.description: Blowgun darts can be poisoned and can be fast, silent, and effective killers. These are not blowgun darts. These are darts you throw. They are not effective weapons but they're better than nothing in a pinch.

item.name: Darts
item.description: Blowgun darts can be poisoned and can be fast, silent, and effective killers. These are not blowgun darts. These are darts you throw. They are not effective weapons but they're better than nothing in a pinch.

item.name: Darts
item.description: Blowgun darts can be poisoned and can be fast, silent, and effective killers. These are not blowgun darts. These are darts you throw. They are not effective weapons but they're better than nothing in a pinch. It seems someone has enchanted these. They may be even more effective than usual.

item.name: Throwing Knives
item.description: These blades are superb for a close morning shave. They're also good for tossing at things you want to kill. Don't ding them up too much with your beard, they won't be as aerodynamic.

item.name: Throwing Knives
item.description: These blades are superb for a close morning shave. They're also good for tossing at things you want to kill. Don't ding them up too much with your beard, they won't be as aerodynamic.

item.name: Arrows
item.description: Arrows are the ammunition for most bows. They are straight sticks with pointed heads and feather tails for balance and stability when fired. Crossbows are different; they use bolts as ammunition.

item.name: Arrows
item.description: Arrows are the ammunition for most bows. They are straight sticks with pointed heads and feather tails for balance and stability when fired. Crossbows are different; they use bolts as ammunition.

item.name: Arrows
item.description: Arrows are the ammunition for most bows. They are straight sticks with pointed heads and feather tails for balance and stability when fired. Crossbows are different; they use bolts as ammunition. It seems someone has enchanted these. They may be even more effective than usual.

item.name: Javelins
item.description: Javelins are long, pointy sticks designed for throwing. Some can be flung with launchers for greater distance and speed, if you have one. If you hit someone with it with enough force, it can be deadly, but it's not as deadly as walking up and stabbing them. It may be less deadly for you too, though.

item.name: Javelins
item.description: Javelins are long, pointy sticks designed for throwing. Some can be flung with launchers for greater distance and speed, if you have one. If you hit someone with it with enough force, it can be deadly, but it's not as deadly as walking up and stabbing them. It may be less deadly for you too, though.

item.name: Bow
item.description: A bow is a curved object, usually wood, with a string tied to both ends. When flexed and released, it can fling an arrow for quite some distance and with quite a punch.

item.name: Bow
item.description: A bow is a curved object, usually wood, with a string tied to both ends. When flexed and released, it can fling an arrow for quite some distance and with quite a punch.

item.name: Bow
item.description: A bow is a curved object, usually wood, with a string tied to both ends. When flexed and released, it can fling an arrow for quite some distance and with quite a punch.

item.name: Bow
item.description: A bow is a curved object, usually wood, with a string tied to both ends. When flexed and released, it can fling an arrow for quite some distance and with quite a punch. It seems someone has enchanted this one. It may be even more effective than usual.

item.name: Crossbow
item.description: Crossbows are similar to bows. You stick a bolt on the notch, point, and pull the trigger, and the bolt goes flying toward somebody with the intention of hurting them. It's easier to use than a bow but it's heavier, and bolts may be harder to find than arrows.

item.name: Crossbow
item.description: Crossbows are similar to bows. You stick a bolt on the notch, point, and pull the trigger, and the bolt goes flying toward somebody with the intention of hurting them. It's easier to use than a bow but it's heavier, and bolts may be harder to find than arrows.

item.name: Crossbow
item.description: Crossbows are similar to bows. You stick a bolt on the notch, point, and pull the trigger, and the bolt goes flying toward somebody with the intention of hurting them. It's easier to use than a bow but it's heavier, and bolts may be harder to find than arrows. It seems someone has enchanted this one. It may be even more effective than usual.

item.name: Bolts
item.description: Bolts are the ammunition for crossbows. The are shorter, sturdier, and differently balanced than arrows. Bolts can also be used to hold two objects together when inserted through a hole and combined with a nut and washer. But not these bolts. These are for killing.

item.name: Bolts
item.description: Bolts are the ammunition for crossbows. The are shorter, sturdier, and differently balanced than arrows. Bolts can also be used to hold two objects together when inserted through a hole and combined with a nut and washer. But not these bolts. These are for killing.

item.name: Bolts
item.description: Bolts are the ammunition for crossbows. The are shorter, sturdier, and differently balanced than arrows. Unlike the kind used to fasten things together with nuts and washers, these bolts are just for killing. It seems someone has enchanted these. They may be even more effective than usual.

item.name: Sling
item.description: This is a strap of leather which you can use to fling any object which you can fit into it at somebody. There's always something lying around to throw, which makes this device quite flexible and useful.

item.name: Sling
item.description: This is a strap of leather which you can use to fling any object which you can fit into it at somebody. There's always something lying around to throw, which makes this device quite flexible and useful. It seems someone has enchanted this one. It may be even more effective than usual.

item.name: Leather Baldric
item.description: This is a light piece of leather armor, worn on the torso. It doesn't provide much protection by armor's standards, but it will protect against light blows, and allows easy movement compared to heavier armor.

item.name: Leather Armor
item.description: This is shirt of tough leather hardened by boiling it in wax. It's good protection for the money, and it's not so heavy as to be uncomfortable on long treks. It won't help much when someone tries to stab you with a big sword though.

item.name: Studded Armor
item.description: This is hardened leather armor, with studs of metal poking through it. It's a step up from simple leather armor, as the studs will distribute blows a bit. This is the lightest armor most serious melee fighters will want to wear.

item.name: Chain Mail
item.description: Chain mail is made from interlocking rings of metal wire. It's very flexible and good at distributing blows, including blows from swords. It's still heavy though, and a heavy enough blow to it will still result in shattered bones.

item.name: Breastplate
item.description: Breastplates are chain mail armor with large plates of metal covering the chest. They offer more protection for your vital organs than simple chain mail, but they're rather heavy.

item.name: Plate Armor
item.description: Plate armor is made from multiple large, interlocking plates. They offer superb protection due to their weight and rigidity. The same weight and rigidity also make them very hard to move in, however.

item.name: Studded Armor
item.description: This is hardened leather armor, with studs of metal poking through it. It's a step up from simple leather armor, as the studs will distribute blows a bit. This is the lightest armor most serious melee fighters will want to wear.

item.name: Chain Mail
item.description: Chain mail is made from interlocking rings of metal wire. It's very flexible and good at distributing blows, including blows from swords. It's still heavy though, and a heavy enough blow to it will still result in shattered bones.

item.name: Breastplate
item.description: Breastplates are chain mail armor with large plates of metal covering the chest. They offer more protection for your vital organs than simple chain mail, but they're rather heavy.

item.name: Plate Armor
item.description: Plate armor is made from multiple large, interlocking plates. They offer superb protection due to their weight and rigidity. The same weight and rigidity also make them very hard to move in, however.

item.description: A buckler is a small, light shield, worn on the forearm. These are useful for blocking blows in agile combat.

item.description: This is a mid-sized shield. It's good for blocking blows from large weapons while poking your sword or spear around it. If really needed you can hit someone with it, but it's not at all an effective weapon, so don't expect to use it as one.

item.name: Shield
item.description: A large shield is, as the name implies, a very large shield. These are typically used in formation, with polearms sticking between them. They're also good for blocking arrows. They are very unwieldy and provide more protection than most shields, at the cost of the user's ability to attack effectively.

item.description: Your head is important. Without your head, you cannot show your emotions and your communication will be misunderstood. Please protect your head. Wear a helmet.

item.name: Greathelm
item.description: This is a helmet, designed to protect the wearer's head and face. Most helmets will protect the crown of the head, the sides, and maybe the neck. This greathelm has shielding for the face as well, with slits to see and breathe through but otherwise offering good coverage.

item.name: Gloves
item.description: Gloves are pieces of cloth or leather, stitched together in a shape that will cover the hands. Some are to keep warm, or to protect from caustic material, or just to look fancy. They will not usually provide protection from combat weapons, however.

item.name: Gauntlets
item.description: Gauntlets are metal gloves, designed to protect the hands and fingers. Once they grip a weapon, they make it harder to lose fingers, but they do not tend to allow for great flexibility or dexterity.

item.name: Boots
item.description: Boots are a type of footwear, usually for use during heavy physical activity that may endanger the feet or ankles. Some of them are more decorative than functional. These are functional.

item.name: Boots
item.description: Boots are a type of footwear, usually for use during heavy physical activity that may endanger the feet or ankles. Some of them are more decorative than functional. These are functional. They have steel plates protecting the toes, but that obviously makes them heavier.

item.name: Lockpicks
item.description: Lockpicks are for subtly getting through locks without using using a key or smashing them. It's less dangerous and makes you less likely to get caught, but lockpicks take much skill to use effectively.

item.name: Poison
item.description: If you have the know-how, you can smear poison on your weaponry, causing the defender to become rather ill when you cut them. Be careful not to get it into your own system though. Poison is poisonous for you too.

item.name: Horn
item.description: This is the horn of a bull or ram, hollowed, with the tip cut off to blow into and make a loud sound. Armies throughout history have used horns to signal and rally the troops. This one, simple in form though it is, seems to be enchanted. Maybe this one will also bring an army to your aid?

item.name: Scroll
item.description: This is a scroll of paper, vellum, or the like, inscribed with magical symbols. Reading it aloud will result in a magical effect, and the scroll will be destroyed in the process. These are great for those who can't cast spells on their own. No years of study and harsh apprenticeship; you just need to be literate.

item.name: Wand
item.description: A wand is a fancy stick or rod. Sometimes they're used for ceremonial purposes by clergy or royalty. This one is magical. Waving it will result in a magical effect or spell being cast, which could be good or bad...

item.name: Potion
item.description: This is an alchemical potion. Alchemists have long sought the secret to eternal life, searching for just the right ingredients and the right mixture and preparation for their potions. They fund these endeavors by selling simpler potions to the public. Drinking this potion will have some effect on the drinker.

item.name: Metal Bar
item.description: This is an ingot of metal. Ingots are formed from molten metal poured into molds. It allows for easy storage and transport, compared to, say, carrying a sack of nuggets or coins. It's also easier to standardize the weight this way. The ingot may have a mark on it indicating its purity and place of creation.

item.name: Gloves
item.description: Gloves are pieces of cloth or leather, stitched together in a shape that will cover the hands. They have many uses, but they will not usually provide protection from combat weapons. This unusual pair happens to be made from a poisonous snake's skin. Maybe it's got some special property.

item.name: Gloves
item.description: Gloves are pieces of cloth or leather, stitched together in a shape that will cover the hands. They have many uses, but they will not usually provide protection from combat weapons. This pair, however, bears the crest of the Kingdom of Exile, and the seal of its wise king, Micah. If these were his, they may be rather special.

item.name: Boots
item.description: Boots are a type of footwear, usually for use during heavy physical activity that may endanger the feet or ankles. Some of them are more decorative than functional. These specific boots have a magical sensation about them, and probably have some special property.

item.description: This is an alchemical potion. Alchemists have long sought the secret to eternal life, searching for just the right ingredients and the right mixture and preparation for their potions. They fund these endeavors by selling simpler potions to the public. Drinking this potion will have some effect on the drinker.

item.name: Potion
item.description: This is the food of the gods! Somehow some of it ended up in your mortal hands. Swallowing this beverage will probably have very powerful and positive effects on you.

Alchemists have long sought the secret to eternal life, searching for just the right ingredients and the right mixture and preparation for their potions. They fund these endeavors by selling simpler potions to the public. Drinking this potion will have some effect on the drinker.

item.name: Darts
item.description: This is a single dart, a little fancier than most. More interesting than the fanciness is that when you throw it, it strikes its target and then safely flies back to your hand. This may come in handy if you are practicing for the tournament in the local tavern.

item.name: Javelins
item.description: These javelins are warm to the touch, and when you grip them your hair stands on end. You can only imagine what would happen if you were to impale someone with one.

item.name: Arrows
item.description: This unusual quiver seems to refill itself as you fire its arrows. You won't have to worry about running out of ammo as long as you keep this close by.

item.name: Arrows
item.description: Arrows are the ammunition for most bows. They are straight sticks with pointed heads and feather tails for balance and stability when fired. Crossbows are different; they use bolts as ammunition. It seems someone has enchanted these. They may be even more effective than usual.

item.name: Arrows
item.description: Arrows are the ammunition for most bows. They are straight sticks with pointed heads and feather tails for balance and stability when fired. Crossbows are different; they use bolts as ammunition. It seems someone has enchanted these. They may be even more effective than usual.

item.name: Arrows
item.description: Arrows are the ammunition for most bows. They are straight sticks with pointed heads and feather tails for balance and stability when fired. Crossbows are different; they use bolts as ammunition. It seems someone has enchanted these. They may be even more effective than usual.

item.name: Arrows
item.description: Arrows are the ammunition for most bows. They are straight sticks with pointed heads and feather tails for balance and stability when fired. Crossbows are different; they use bolts as ammunition. It seems someone has enchanted these. They may be even more effective than usual.

item.name: Bow
item.description: A bow is a curved object, usually wood, with a string tied to both ends. When flexed and released, it can fling an arrow for quite some distance and with quite a punch. It seems someone has enchanted this one. It may be even more effective than usual.

item.name: Bow
item.description: This bow bears the name "Kag". Perhaps this Kag was an adventurer like you. You have to wonder why it's not still in Kag's possession though. It may be a good or neutral reason, or it may be unfortunate...

item.name: Darts
item.description: These are throwing darts for combat, with an unusual feature: They look like they'll inject poison into whatever they stick into. They're still throwing darts and not blowgun darts complete with blowgun, but they still look like they'd be effective.

item.name: Wand
item.description: A wand is a fancy stick or rod. Sometimes they're used for ceremonial purposes by clergy or royalty. This one is magical. Waving it will result in a magical effect or spell being cast, which could be good or bad...

item.name: Wand
item.description: A wand is a fancy stick or rod. Sometimes they're used for ceremonial purposes by clergy or royalty. This one is magical. Waving it will result in a magical effect or spell being cast, which could be good or bad...

item.name: Wand
item.description: A wand is a fancy stick or rod. Sometimes they're used for ceremonial purposes by clergy or royalty. This one is magical. Waving it will result in a magical effect or spell being cast, which could be good or bad...

item.name: Wand
item.description: A wand is a fancy stick or rod. Sometimes they're used for ceremonial purposes by clergy or royalty. This one is magical, and bears the name of Carrunos, goddess of the hunt. Supposedly she likes a challenging hunt, so this wand may be for that purpose...

item.name: Wand
item.description: A wand is a fancy stick or rod. Sometimes they're used for ceremonial purposes by clergy or royalty. This one is magical. Waving it will result in a magical effect or spell being cast, which could be good or bad...

item.name: Wand
item.description: This magical wand bears the name "Vorb". Perhaps this Vorb was an adventurer like you. You have to wonder why it's not still in Vorb's possession though. It may be a good or neutral reason, or it may be unfortunate...

item.name: Wand
item.description: A wand is a fancy stick or rod. Sometimes they're used for ceremonial purposes by clergy or royalty. This one is magical. Waving it will result in a magical effect or spell being cast, which could be good or bad...

item.name: Ring
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. Rings tend to be worn on the fingers and toes. Mostly they're for decoration or religious significance, but this one seems to be magical.

item.name: Ring

item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. Rings tend to be worn on the fingers and toes. Mostly they're for decoration or religious significance. Whatever religion this was significant for isn't one you want to be a part of, judging by the eerie inscriptions...

item.name: Ring
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. Rings tend to be worn on the fingers and toes. Mostly they're for decoration or religious significance. This one included. It's worth quite a bit though.

item.name: Ring
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. Rings tend to be worn on the fingers and toes. This one features a creepy snake design. It doesn't seem to be cursed, though. It may even be helpful...

item.name: Ring
item.description: This ring bears the name "Aescal". Perhaps this Aescal was an adventurer like you. You have to wonder why it's not still in Aescal's possession though. It may be a good or neutral reason, or it may be unfortunate...

item.name: Necklace
item.description: An ankh is an ancient symbol of the power of life. This silver one, hanging from a chain, seems to give you a nice, safe feeling when you touch it.

item.name: Necklace
item.description: This small amulet, featuring a serpentine design and made of lead, a rather heavy but also rather poisonous metal, makes your fingertips feel very hardened for a few moments after you rub it. This could help you apply poison to your weapons more safely and effectively.

item.name: Necklace
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. This piece is meant to be worn about the neck. Mostly they're for decoration or religious significance, but this one seems to be magical.

item.name: Necklace
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. This piece is meant to be worn about the neck. Mostly they're for decoration or religious significance, but this one seems to be magical.

item.name: Necklace
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. This piece is a string of teeth of some undetermined species. to wear about the neck. Despite the creepy materials, you feel more confident when you touch it. It must be blessed by some primative tribal deity.

item.name: Necklace
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. This piece is meant to be worn about the neck. Mostly they're for decoration or religious significance, but this one seems to be magical.

item.name: Necklace
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. This piece is meant to be worn about the neck. Mostly they're for decoration or religious significance. This one included. It's worth quite a bit though.

item.name: Necklace
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. This piece is meant to be worn about the neck. Mostly they're for decoration or religious significance. This one included. It's worth quite a bit though.

item.name: Necklace
item.description: This amulet is made of frosted glass, with light swirling within. It trembles when you are hurt. It'll probably shatter and release that light into you if you were to die, bringing you back to life. Or so you surmise.

item.name: Necklace
item.description: This is a large dragon's scale suspended from a leather cord. It burns your hand the tighter you squeeze it, but you feel deep, sibilant chatter moving through your mind at the same time. If you squeezed it hard enough, who knows what will happen?

item.name: Necklace
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. This piece is meant to be worn about the neck. Mostly they're for decoration or religious significance, but this one seems to be magical.

item.name: Necklace
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. This piece is meant to be worn about the neck. Mostly they're for decoration or religious significance. Whatever religion this was significant for isn't one you want to be a part of, judging by the eerie inscriptions...

item.name: Necklace
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. This piece is meant to be worn about the neck. Mostly they're for decoration or religious significance, but this one seems to be magical.

item.name: Necklace
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. This piece is meant to be worn about the neck. Mostly they're for decoration or religious significance. This one included. It's worth quite a bit though.

item.name: Metal Bar
item.description: This is an ingot of metal. Ingots are formed from molten metal poured into molds. It allows for easy storage and transport, compared to, say, carrying a sack of nuggets or coins. It's also easier to standardize the weight this way. The strange ingot has no marks of purity on it, but it feels mysteriously warm to the touch...

item.name: Metal Bar
item.description: This is an ingot of metal. Ingots are formed from molten metal poured into molds. It allows for easy storage and transport, compared to, say, carrying a sack of nuggets or coins. It's also easier to standardize the weight this way. The ingot may have a mark on it indicating its purity and place of creation.

item.name: Salve
item.description: This is an alchemical potion. Alchemists have long sought the secret to eternal life, searching for just the right ingredients and the right mixture and preparation for their potions. They fund these endeavors by selling simpler potions to the public. Rubbing in this lotion will have some sort of effect on the body.

item.name: Balm
item.description: This is an alchemical potion. Alchemists have long sought the secret to eternal life, searching for just the right ingredients and the right mixture and preparation for their potions. They fund these endeavors by selling simpler potions to the public. Rubbing in this lotion will have some sort of effect on the body.

item.name: Rock
item.description: This is a gem or crystal. They can be very valuable, especially if they have few imperfections and are cut right. Some go beyond being pretty, though. A good crystal, besides enchanting the heart of the object of your affections, can be excellent enchanting material itself.

item.name: Rock
item.description: This is a gem or crystal. They can be very valuable, especially if they have few imperfections and are cut right. Some go beyond being pretty, though. A good crystal, besides enchanting the heart of the object of your affections, can be excellent enchanting material itself.

item.name: Rock
item.description: This appears to be a mundane rock, although there's something odd and magical about it.

item.name: Knife
item.description: This knife can be used to slice vegetables for a lovely stir fry. However, it's mostly designed for stabbing people. Please wash it before slicing your vegetables. It seems someone has enchanted this one. It may be even more effective than usual, perhaps even aiding in combat and not just cooking.

item.name: Knife
item.description: This knife can be used to slice vegetables for a lovely stir fry. This knife will help you prepare a stir fry that will kill anyone who eats it. It's smeared with poison that never seems to wear off.

item.name: Waveblade
item.description: This waveblade is strange even by the usual standards. The hilt design, the pattern of the blade, and of course, the slime that drips from its edges.

item.name: Greatsword
item.description: This sword of legend was used to slay a number of very powerful demons during the founding and defense of the Kingdom of Exile. Repaired was the blade that was damaged, not all who adventure are confused...

item.name: Broadsword
item.description: Broadswords are broad swords. More specifically, they're big, heavy swords, with a lot of momentum. Most people can't wield them one-handed, although if one were very strong it could work. The pommel of this one is shaped like the severed head of a fanged lizard.

item.name: Red Sword
item.description: This sword is growing red with heat. Swinging it produces a trail of hot flames! This will easily burn anyone struck with its blade, sharp and deadly already. They say a sword like this defends paradise from the outcast...

item.name: Hammer
item.description: This heavy hammer is inscribed with arcane symbols. You recognize it as a legendary weapon from the early days of Exile: It's powerful on its own, but it will especially bring down to size any giant it strikes.

item.name: Mace
item.description: This mace is covered with holy symbols of life, and along its handle is a glowing inscription of a prayer to bring peace to restless souls.

item.name: Rock
item.description: This rock isn't especially heavy. But boy, is everything else!

item.name: Rock
item.description: The burden of your equipment and loot has lightened! Either you've been pickpocketed, or this stone is to blame.

item.name: Powder
item.description: This is a small pouch of powder. Dirt is a powder, but a small pouch of dirt has few useful or harmful properties. This probably isn't dirt, so be careful with it.

item.name: Powder
item.description: This is a small pouch of powder. Dirt is a powder, but a small pouch of dirt has few useful or harmful properties. This probably isn't dirt, so be careful with it.

item.name: Potion
item.description: This is an alchemical potion. Alchemists have long sought the secret to eternal life, searching for just the right ingredients and the right mixture and preparation for their potions. They fund these endeavors by selling simpler potions to the public. Drinking this potion will have some effect on the drinker.

item.name: Wand
item.description: A wand is a fancy stick or rod. Sometimes they're used for ceremonial purposes by clergy or royalty. This one is magical. Waving it will result in a magical effect or spell being cast, which could be good or bad...

item.name: Wand
item.description: A wand is a fancy stick or rod. Sometimes they're used for ceremonial purposes by clergy or royalty. This one is magical. Waving it will result in a magical effect or spell being cast, which could be good or bad...

item.name: Helm
item.description: A helmet is a good way to protect your head from injury, taking hits and absorbing damage in the stead of your brain. It seems someone has enchanted this one. It may be even more effective than usual.

item.name: Shield
item.description: This shield bears the name "Kron". Perhaps this Kron was an adventurer like you. You have to wonder why it's not still in Kron's possession though. It may be a good or neutral reason, or it may be unfortunate...

item.name: Short Sword
item.description: This short sword seems to have wand-like magical properties to it. You can stab or slash something with it, or you could just wave it at them...

item.name: Mace
item.description: This mace is unusually shaped. It's thick and heavy, and the handle is reinforced. It could probably be used to block a blow, in addition to striking one.

item.name: Ring
item.description: You can hear something sloshing around inside this runed ring. If you gave it a good shake, something might happen.

item.name: Holly
item.description: This is an alchemical ingredient. If you know the recipe, have the right combination of ingredients, and have studied up on technique, you can use it to make a potion.

item.name: Axe
item.description: Most of the equipment adventurers use is meant to aid in combat or other activities, but this item has an unpleasant sensation around it. It appears someone or something put a curse on it. You can use it and it may even be useful, but it'll have negative effects, and you may not be able to put it down easily...

item.name: Ring
item.description: Jewelry is the ancient art of adorning the body with trinkets, shiny things, and small talismans. Rings tend to be worn on the fingers and toes. Mostly they're for decoration or religious significance. Whatever religion this was significant for isn't one you want to be a part of, judging by the eerie inscriptions...

item.name: Halberd
item.description: Most of the equipment adventurers use is meant to aid in combat or other activities, but this item has an unpleasant sensation around it. It appears someone or something put a curse on it. You can use it and it may even be useful, but it'll have negative effects, and you may not be able to put it down easily...

item.name: Ore
item.description: This is a lump of rock, glistening with precious metal. Nothing can be done with it in its current form. It's worthless for you but you could sell it. A metallurgist would like it.

item.name: Ore
item.description: This is a lump of rock, glistening with precious metal. Nothing can be done with it in its current form. It's worthless for you but you could sell it. A metallurgist would like it.

item.name: Broadsword
item.description: Broadswords are broad swords. More specifically, they're big, heavy swords, with a lot of momentum. Most people can't wield them one-handed, but adventurers aren't most people. This one is made of mithral, a very rare metal which is very light but strong.

item.name: Staff
item.description: This is a simple wooden staff, made from a long, straight stick. It may have some ornamentation but it's nothing special or magical. A proficient wielder can hit things with it and even block blows.

item.name: Staff
item.description: This is a simple wooden staff, made from a long, straight stick. It's a little tougher and more rugged than usual, but it's not magical. A proficient wielder can hit things with it and even block blows.

item.name: Staff
item.description: This staff spouts small sparks from its tip. The inscriptions along its length side refer to arcane matters. It will probably make your mage spells more effective.

item.name: Staff
item.description: This staff spouts small sparks from its tip. The inscriptions along its length side refer to arcane matters. It will probably make your mage spells more effective.

item.name: Staff
item.description: This staff is a natural tree branch, with a vine winding around it, and holding fast a sparkling ruby at the tip. The druidic runes carved into the vine around the ruby indicate that wielding this staff will boost your priestly abilities.

item.name: Staff
item.description: This staff is a natural tree branch, with a vine winding around it, and holding fast a sparkling ruby at the tip. The druidic runes carved into the vine around the ruby indicate that wielding this staff will boost your priestly abilities.

item.name: Staff
item.description: This staff is gnarled, splintering, and dirty. What's more, when you pick it up, your legs feel weak, so you let go. Just being around it makes you feel wierd. It's cursed, and if you lean on it too hard, you won't be able to let it go...

item.name: Book
item.description: The contents of this unadorned book detail the methods by which one can concoct useful potions that will not explode in your face. This book will make good reference material, if you keep it handy.

item.name: Book
item.description: This book features illustrations and bits of history, and shows how to identify useful treasure, as well as useless or dangerous treasure. This book will make good reference material, if you keep it handy.

item.name: Book
item.description: This book details the process and methods of conjuring magical effects. It describes step-by-step how to focus the mind properly and what movements are effective, as well as which will be dangerous. This book will make good reference material, if you keep it handy.

item.name: Book
item.description: This book details the process and methods of conjuring magical effects. It describes step-by-step how to focus the mind properly and what movements are effective, as well as which will be dangerous. This book will make good reference material, if you keep it handy.

item.name: Book
item.description: This book features religious lore and moral guidance. It also describes holy chants, prayers, and how to cast priestly spells. This book will make good reference material, if you keep it handy.

item.name: Book
item.description: This book features religious lore and moral guidance. It also describes holy chants, prayers, and how to cast priestly spells. This book will make good reference material, if you keep it handy.

item.name: Book
item.description: This... this is a book of comic strips. They're horrible and the humor wore off within a couple pages of the same jokes over and over, but somehow you can't stop reading it. You feel stupid just looking at it. You... really do. This book must be cursed...

item.name: Hat
item.description: This tall, pointed cap sparkles with magic. It's also rather fashionable.

item.name: Horn
item.description: This is the horn of a bull or ram, hollowed, with the tip cut off to blow into and make a loud sound. There is a strong magical vibration when you blow into this one. If you blew it hard enough, you might be able to shatter fragile things nearby.

item.name: Pipes
item.description: These pipes are made from reeds and held together with a cloth band. Each reed is of a different length, and will produce a different note when blown across. This particular set is clearly magical.

item.name: Pipes
item.description: These pipes are made from reeds and held together with a cloth band. Each reed is of a different length, and will produce a different note when blown across. This particular set is clearly magical.

item.name: Lyre
item.description: A lyre is a small, portable harp. It features a series of strings of different lengths spanning a curved frame. It has a very pleasant, calming sound to it. This one is clearly magical.

item.name: Lute
item.description: A lute is a hollow, gourd-shaped body with a long neck, strings running from the end of the neck to the base of the body. It is played by plucking the strings, causing vibrations which are amplified by the hollow body. This one is clearly magical.

item.name: Coronet
item.description: A coronet is a long, flaired tube of metal, curved around to make it easy to carry. It is played by blowing into the narrow end, creating a bold sound. This one is clearly magical.

item.name: Coronet
item.description: The sound of this coronet is lovely. Maybe too lovely... It looks like it boosts the morale of your foes instead of your allies, and it appears to be cursed.

item.name: Fur
item.description: This is the skin and fur of a dead animal. The fur is patchy and ugly, like the deceased was not quite healthy, and the skin has numerous holes and tears. It'll serve as a blanket and someone of limited means might want it, but it might not be very comfortable.

item.name: Fur
item.description: This is the skin and fur of a dead animal. It's in very good condition and would make for a warm blanket or rustic rug. It could fetch a good price.
